version: '3.8'

services:
  web:
    build: .
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: production
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://user:pass@db:5432/myapp
    depends_on:
      - db
      - redis
    volumes:
      - ./uploads:/app/uploads
    restart: unless-stopped

  db:
    image: postgres:15-alpine
    environment:
      POSTGRES_USER: user
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: pass
      POSTGRES_DB: myapp
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    ports:
      - "6379:6379"

volumes:
  postgres_data:
